data.eml:eml: A new species of Hyloscirtus (Anura, Hylidae) from the Colombian and Venezuelan slopes of Sierra de Perijá, and the phylogenetic position of Hyloscirtus jahni (Rivero, 1961)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rojas-Runjaic, Fernando J. M., Infante-Rivero, Edwin E., Salerno, Patricia E., Meza-Joya, Fabio Leonardo (2018): A new species of Hyloscirtus (Anura, Hylidae) from the Colombian and Venezuelan slopes of Sierra de Perijá, and the phylogenetic position of Hyloscirtus jahni (Rivero, 1961). Zootaxa 4382 (1): 121-146, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.1.4
